Detailed Description

Bayesian Dirichlet Equivalent Uniform used as an edge score.

See Also
plNodeScoreBDeu, plEdgeScoreFromNodeScore.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

plEdgeScoreBDeu::plEdgeScoreBDeu ( plDataDescriptor &  data_desc,
plFloat  Nprime 
)
inline

Construct a BDeu edge score object operating on a given dataset.

Parameters
data_descthe data descriptor ;
Nprimeparameter used for defining the bayesian prior.

Note that the object keeps a reference to the dataset, so don't destroy it during the lifetime of the score object.

plFloat  Nprime,
const plVariablesConjunction &  conditioning_variables 
)
inline

Construct a BDeu edge score object operating on a given dataset.

Parameters
data_descthe data descriptor ;
Nprimeparameter used for defining the bayesian prior.
conditioning_variablesthe variables condioning the score If this parameter is not empty, the score is assumed to be conditional

Note that the object keeps a reference to the dataset, so don't destroy it during the lifetime of the score object.
